price: 17. Alle wuu idinka waanin inaad u noqotaan waxaasoo kale weligiin, haddaad tihiin mu’miniin dhab ah.
arabic: يَعِظُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَن تَعُودُواْ لِمِثۡلِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿiẓukumu al-lahu an taʿūdū limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minīna
